TUI-VTT.Config.Title: TUI VTT Configuration
TUI VTT Configuration
TUI-VTT.Config.TargetName_Hint: Name of the user who has the TV connected.
TUI-VTT.Config.Touch_Hint: Touch configuration for IR Touch Frames or other touch screens.
TUI-VTT.Config.MovementMethod_Hint: Sets the movement and vision method. 'Default' is the default Foundry behavior (vision updates after move), 'Live' updates the vision while moving, 'Step-by-Step' moves the token onto every grid you drag along, updating the vision every step.
TUI-VTT.Config.Deselect_Hint: Deselect the token when it is no longer dragged.
TUI-VTT.Config.MovementMarker_Hint: During token movement, draw a marker to indicate where the token will move moved to on token drop.
TUI-VTT.Config.TouchNavigation_Hint: Allows the user to pan with 2 Fingers and zoom with 3 fingers.
TUI-VTT.Config.NonownedMovement_Hint: Enable the movement of non-owned tokens.
TUI-VTT.Config.CollisionPrevention_Hint: When enabled, Material Plane will try to prevent two tokens from colliding by placing the moving token onto the nearest empty grid space along its movement path.
TUI-VTT.Config.HideDisplay_Hint: Hides all display elements for the target player (if not GM). Client can press the 'Ctrl' button to toggle the elements.
TUI-VTT.Config.BlockInteraction_Hint: Block interactions with the canvas while this screen is open.
TUI-VTT.Config.TapMode_Hint: Sets the tap mode. This can be used to distinguish between touches caused by minis and taps that are meant to interact with the canvas (such as opening doors).
TUI-VTT.Config.TapMode_Timeout_Hint: 'Tap Timeout': When a new touch is detected, a timer will start. If the touch is removed before the timer is bigger than 'Tap Timeout', MP will assume it was a tap. Otherwise it'll assume a mini was placed. Token movement will start after 'Tap Timeout' has elapsed.
TUI-VTT.Config.TapMode_RaiseMini_Hint: 'Raise Mini': When a new touch is detected, MP will check if a touch has recently (within the last 'Tap Timeout' ms) ended near the new touch. It that's the case, MP will assume a mini is being moved, otherwise it'll assume a tap.
TUI-VTT.Config.TouchTimeout_Hint: Time in milliseconds after which a token is dropped if no new touch is detected.
TUI-VTT.Config.TapTimeout_Hint: Sets the timeout (in ms) to detect a tap. The exact function depends on 'Tap Mode'. For 'Tap Timeout', the value should be relatively small (probably 500ms or smaller), while for 'Raise Mini' it should be bigger (probably 1000 to 2000ms).
TUI-VTT.Config.ScaleX_Hint: Scales all coordinates on the X-axis by a set value to fix alignment issues.
TUI-VTT.Config.ScaleY_Hint: Scales all coordinates on the Y-axis by a set value to fix alignment issues.
TUI-VTT.Config.RotationThreshold_Hint: Rotates the token when it is dragged over a cirtain threshold.
TUI-VTT.Config.PatternSetup_Hint: Configure patterns to be linked to specific tokens or actors.
